title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment banner: workout,strava h1: 快速开始 categories: [设计开发, iOS开发] tags: [iOS, 心率] references: - ‘心跳之旅—💗—iOS用手机摄像头检测心率(PPG)‘ - ‘PPG光电容积脉搏波描记法技术概况‘ …open_graph: image: /assets/xaoxuu/blog/2022-1029a@2x.webp
